subject: Order now and don't forget about a discount
body:
Dear valued member.
With this special pharmaceutical bulletin we introduce MyCanadianPharmacy providing high quality products at low cost.
We supply our customers with affordable and safe Canadian products which are of the same quality as American drugs. 
Click here to checkhttp://canthis.hk
Absolute security and confidentiality guaranteed.You will be satisfied with the variety of drugs available.
Sincerely yours,Tami Marrero
